advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
SongFreaks is the music player for true music lovers. If you never go anywhere without your headphones, if you always have your music with you, if you love to listen and sing along to your songs, then this player is for you.

We’ve added the feature you’ve been asking for! Now if you don’t have mp3s in your phone, you can watch (or just listen to) unlimited YouTube videos for just about any song you can think of. With synced lyrics!

Millions of people can't be wrong! Brought to you by SongFreaks.com!

With SongFreaks you can: 
* Listen to any of the MP3s in your iPhone, iPod Touch, or iPad music library 
* Watch YouTube videos from all your favorite artists – with synced lyrics!
* See the official lyrics to millions of songs, right in your player. Our lyrics are hand-checked, accurate, and fully licensed. 
* Add your own lyrics! 
* Our fancy LyricStream technology highlights lyric lines in time with the music! 
* We don't have LyricStream for a song? No problem - you can easily add your own 
* Look up millions of lyrics (even for songs you don't have) 
* Find information about your favorite artists 
* Browse albums and top charts 
* Save your favorite lyrics on your iPhone, iPod, or iPad, so you can view them at any time, even without Internet access
trackCensoredName: SongFreaks Music, Lyric and Video Player: Find lyrics to Hip-Hop,Dance,Country,Top 40,Pop,Gospel,Rock,kpop,jpop songs. Watch YouTube videos. Sing along to MP3 playlists, album tracks. Words to tunes from Robin Thicke, Imagine Dragons, Lumineers, Glee
